name: GitHub
description: GitHub API integration for complete repository management including CRUD operations for repos, branches, issues, PRs, files, and more.

org.description: Organization name (if creating in an org)

get_repository.description: Get detailed information about a repository

list_repositories.description: List repositories for a user or organization

sha.description: SHA or branch to start listing commits from

path.description: Only commits containing this file path

since.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter commits after

until.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter commits before

create_issue_comment.description: Create a comment on an issue

list_pull_requests.description: List pull requests for a repository

after.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter PRs created after this date

before.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter PRs created before this date

limit.description: Maximum number of PRs to return

get_pull_request.description: Get detailed information about a pull request

add_pull_request_reviewers.description: Add reviewers to a pull request

remove_pull_request_reviewers.description: Remove reviewers from a pull request

list_pull_request_reviewers.description: List reviewers for a pull request

create_pull_request_review.description: Create a review for a pull request

create_file.description: Create a new file in repository

update_file.description: Update an existing file in repository

list_user_repositories.description: List repositories for a specific user or authenticated user

list_organization_repositories.description: List repositories for a specific organization
